Episodes.Title: Chapter One: MADMAX
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up at the arcade, and a skeptical Hopper inspects a field of rotting pumpkins.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: After Will sees something terrible on trick-or-treat night, Mike wonders whether Eleven's still out there. Nancy wrestles with the truth about Barb.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Justin Doble
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Dustin adopts a strange new pet, and Eleven grows increasingly impatient. A well-meaning Bob urges Will to stand up to his fears.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: An ailing Will opens up to Joyce -- with disturbing results. While Hopper digs for the truth, Eleven unearths a surprising discovery.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Five: Dig Dug
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Nancy and Jonathan swap conspiracy theories with a new ally as Eleven searches for someone from her past. "Bob the Brain" tackles a difficult problem.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Six: The Spy
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Kate Trefry
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Will's connection to a shadowy evil grows stronger but no one's quite sure how to stop it. Elsewhere, Dustin and Steve forge an unlikely bond.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Seven: The Lost Sister
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Justin Doble
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Psychic visions draw Eleven to a band of violent outcasts and an angry girl with a shadowy past.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Eight: The Mind Flayer
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: An unlikely hero steps forward when a deadly development puts the Hawkins lab on lockdown, trapping Will and several others inside.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Eleven makes plans to finish what she started while the survivors turn up the heat on the monstrous force that's holding Will hostage.
